topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack® Carrier Grade (Alpha): Create a Virtual Data center for DNS/NTP Network Management

titlealts.searchtitle: HP Helion OpenStack® Carrier Grade (Alpha): Create the DNS/NTP Data Center Network Management VM

body.p: You can configure a virtual data center for DNS and NTP for your cloud using an installer file in the installation kit.

li.p: Copy the dns-ntp-server.qcow2 to /var/lib/libvirt/images folder on your kvm host.

codeblock.codeph: virsh define dns-ntp-server.xml virsh autostart dns-ntp-server virsh start dns-ntp-server

li.p: The VM should be up in few minutes.
Use a tool, such as Virtual Machine Manager, to make sure that the network is configured with br-ctl for NIC1
Launch the HLM Node console and log in using the following defaults:
Execute the ntpd ?q command to synchronize the time with the NTP server.
Execute the ntpq ?p command to make sure the NTP servers are listed.
